Question: The Fourth Coalition was assembled in 1806, and this person defeated Prussia at the Battle of Jena-Auerstedt in October.
Hints: However, this person was able to rush reinforcements to Antwerp, owing to Britain's inadequately organised Walcheren Campaign.
The couple had one child, this person Francis Joseph Charles (1811–1832), known from birth as the King of Rome.
This person spent the last six years of his life in confinement by the British on the island of Saint Helena.
